item.title: Ethereum Foundation drops most ambitious roadmap in years, targets finality in seconds by 2029
item.description: The "strawmap" outlines seven forks through the end of the decade, including post-quantum cryptography, shielded transfers, and a 480x reduction in transaction finality time.

item.title: Telegram‚Äôs in-app crypto wallet to offer yield on Bitcoin, Ether and USDt
item.description: Telegram‚Äôs crypto wallet introduces self-custodial Vaults, letting users earn yields on Bitcoin, Ether and USDt directly inside the messaging app.

item.title: Morning Minute: Circle Earnings Highlight a Massive Day for Crypto
item.description: It was a green day for stablecoin enthusiasts and crypto majors, and positive earnings from NVDA after hours signal the rally may have legs.

item.title: Indiana prepares to put bitcoin in its public retirement plans
item.description: Lawmakers pass HB 1042 allowing public funds to access bitcoin and ETFs, while banning crypto ATMs amid rising fraud concerns.

item.title: Trump family-linked American Bitcoin posts $59 million Q4 loss as bitcoin price slides
item.description: The bitcoin mining company now holds over 6,000 BTC, with roughly one-third acquired through mining and two-thirds through open-market purchases and strategic transactions.

item.description: The roadmap targets faster finality, native privacy, quantum-resistant cryptography, and gigagas throughput across planned upgrades.

item.title: STS Digital raises $30 million to expand crypto options platform
item.description: The Bermuda-based firm offers trading across 400+ cryptocurrencies with spot, vanilla, and exotic options, targeting institutional demand as crypto options open interest reaches $40 billion.

item.title: Middle East tensions boost gold as investors seek safe havens
item.description: Escalating US-Iran tensions are boosting safe-haven demand, with gold attracting investors while equities and Bitcoin face pressure.

item.title: Bitcoin traders explain why $80K is the next target for bulls
item.description: The return of spot Bitcoin ETF inflows may fuel a BTC price recovery, as signs of a potential rebound to $75,000-$80,000 emerge.

item.title: Indiana lawmakers pass crypto rights bill banning discriminatory taxes
item.description: Indiana‚Äôs HB 1042 cleared both chambers and heads to Governor Mike Braun, limiting crypto-specific taxes and opening the door to crypto options for retirement accounts.

item.description: Bitcoin demand has rebounded for the first time since November as ETF inflows hit $506M and Coinbase premium flips positive.

item.description: Fresh inflows lift US Bitcoin ETFs toward a potential first weekly gain after five consecutive weeks of outflows totaling $3.8 billion.
